il.ac.hit.couponsproject.model.dao

Interface ICouponsDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HibernateCouponsDAO

    public interface ICouponsDAO
    This is an interface that connect between the database and the Couopon class all methods listed below

                                     throws CouponException
        Get all coupons by the nearest ones
        Parameters:
        userLatitude - the use latitude
        userLongitude - the user longitude
        Returns:
        a list with coupons ordered by distance

                                                    double userLatitude,
                                                    double userLongitude)
                                             throws CouponException
        Get all coupons by the nearest ones in a specific category
        Parameters:
        category - the selected category to get coupons from
        userLatitude - the use latitude
        userLongitude - the user longitude
        Returns:
        list that contains all the coupons
        Throws:
        CouponException - if there is a problem getting the coupons
